page.title: 11Mr. Lidgett. Part Two.
page.content:
When Mr. Lidgett was young he enjoyed playing games. He was in the village football and cricket teams. In those days they played lots of the games we still play today, for example piggy in the middle, conkers, rounders, marbles, and skittles. One of his favourite games was hoop and stick. The hoop was made of iron and the stick was used to spin the hoop. Although Mr. Lidgett has driven tractors and lorries on farms he has never driven a car on the road. Cycling has always been an important form of transport to Mr. Lidgett and even now he is a keen cyclist.
{See next page.
